Checklist:
Did you search issues to find if somebody asked this question before? If your question is about hang, did you read this doc? If your question is about docker, did you read this doc? Did you check if you question is answered in the troubleshooting guide?
Bug report: Please describe errorneous behavior you're observing and steps to reproduce it.

comments.comment: Hey <denchmark-link:https://github.com/lucifer2503>@lucifer2503</denchmark-link> , was this bug report created in error? Feel free to open with more details if not.
